channel.title: Machine Learning on Jameson's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Jameson's Portfolio

item.title: LA Neighborhood Scores
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Workflow Pipeline Data Processing Feature Extraction Data Wrangling Storing Individual Datasets Data Merging - SparkSQL Firebase Web Application Conclusion Data Sources Goals Introduction The City of Los Angeles, home to nearly 4 million residents, is a trailblazer in many aspects, including data transparency.

item.title: Predicting Statistical Causes of Wildfires
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Notebook Findings Machine Learning Prediction Conclusion Goals Introduction This dataset is a spatial database of historical wildfires in the United States from 1992 to 2015.

item.title: Pommerman
item.description: This project is currently being updated. Based off the classic game Bomberman, my team of 8 people tackle how agents acomplish tasks with infinitely meaningful variations through competitive multi-agent learning.

item.title: Amazon Recommender
item.description: Table of Contents Introduction Goals Algorithms Dataset Models Data Processing Evaluation Conclusion Introduction Our project is an analysis of product and service reviews to determine the general overall sentiment expressed by it.
